titleStmt.title: Charles Haydon to George S. Nun
CWG14210

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
417
Decr. 25" 3.
Capt. Geo. W. Nun.
37 Ky Inf Glasgow Ky.
Sir,
Yours of the 23d instant to the Governor has been handed to me for reply -- Genl Boyle is absent. I will submit your letter to him when he returns for his action.

Respy
Your obedt Servt
Chas Hayden
Clerk
